languages.text: "Вряд ли она мне улыбнется, Ваша Светлость. Но спасибо".
"I doubt that it will smile upon me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. But I thank you nonetheless."
languages.original_text: "Вряд ли она мне улыбнется, Ваша Светлость. Но спасибо".

traits.locale_text: "I doubt that it will smile upon me. But I thank you nonetheless."
traits.speaker: WrackServant

traits.locale_text: "I doubt that it will smile upon me. But I thank you nonetheless."
traits.speaker: WrackServant

traits.locale_text: "I doubt that it will smile upon me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. But I thank you nonetheless."
traits.speaker: WrackServant

traits.locale_text: "I doubt that it will smile upon me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. But I thank you nonetheless."

traits.locale_text: "I doubt that it will smile upon me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. But I thank you nonetheless."

traits.locale_text: "I doubt that it will smile upon me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. But I thank you nonetheless."
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: « Je doute qu'elle me sourie un jour à nouveau, Votre Seigneurie. Mais je vous remercie. »
languages.original_text: "I doubt that it will smile upon me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. But I thank you nonetheless."

traits.locale_text: « Je doute qu'elle me sourie un jour à nouveau, Votre Seigneurie. Mais je vous remercie. »
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: “恐怕好运不会再对我微笑了，大人。但即便如此，我依然非常感激您的善意。”
languages.original_text: "I doubt that it will smile upon me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. But I thank you nonetheless."

traits.locale_text: “恐怕好运不会再对我微笑了，大人。但即便如此，我依然非常感激您的善意。”
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: 「私に微笑んでくれるとは思えませんよ、閣下。しかしそれでも感謝いたします」
languages.original_text: "I doubt that it will smile upon me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. But I thank you nonetheless."

traits.locale_text: 「私に微笑んでくれるとは思えませんよ、閣下。しかしそれでも感謝いたします」
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: "Ich glaube nicht, dass es mir zugewandt sein wird, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Aber ich danke Euch trotzdem."
languages.original_text: "I doubt that it will smile upon me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. But I thank you nonetheless."

traits.locale_text: Ich glaube nicht, dass es mir zugewandt sein wird, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Aber ich danke Euch trotzdem."
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: «Dudo que el destino me sonría, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Pero gracias de todos modos».
languages.original_text: "I doubt that it will smile upon me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. But I thank you nonetheless."

traits.locale_text: «Dudo que el destino me sonría, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Pero gracias de todos modos».
traits.speaker: WrackServant

languages.text: "Talihin yüzüme güleceğini sanmıyorum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri... İyi dilekleriniz için teşekkür ederim."
languages.original_text: "I doubt that it will smile upon me, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. But I thank you nonetheless."

traits.locale_text: "Talihin yüzüme güleceğini sanmıyorum {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri... İyi dilekleriniz için teşekkür ederim."
